purpose: To provide a command-line interface for interacting with various AI assistance services
principle: Built on PowerShell, leveraging C# for extending shell capabilities and integrating AI services
reusability: Modular architecture with support for plugins and extensions, allowing easy integration with different AI services
limitations: Limited to environments where PowerShell is supported, requires configuration for each AI service
name: AIShell
description: An interactive shell to work with AI-powered assistance providers
highlight: An interactive shell for seamless integration with AI-powered assistance providers
